page.title: 16Life Styles
page.content: ll Pebworth W.I members made this survey - 4 were born locally. 7 live here to be near husbands' work places. average age is 42 yrs. We are married with average of 3 children (mostly living at home). Apart from housework most do full, part time or voluntary wprk, as teachers, secretaries, physotherapists etc. We include 4 school governors, play group leader and helper, 4 news sheet editors, 7 village hall committee members, 2 brownie pack leaders and a parish councillor. 4 are regular church goers and we represent all political views. To us, advantages of life here (peace, friendliness, all age groups) outweigh disadvantages( lack of public transport and youth facilities, parochialism). However, we detect a lack of community spirit among new comers to the village.
